TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 32, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 30, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 17, "index": 15}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 16}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 23}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 52, "index": 27}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 42, "index": 36}, {"type": "iron_trapdoor", "quantity": 36, "index": 37}, {"type": "horn_coral", "quantity": 39, "index": 39}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 41, "index": 41}, {"type": "brick_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a granite_slab, I need to place 3 granite blocks in the first row of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move 1 granite block from slot 28 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1
